name: Not Trust!
description:
Do not trust? Why is that the title of the Video Game? Could it be that there is some kind of Glitch that should make me distrust this Video Game? I don't know, but I won't know what you mean by this title, if I don't try it

Game created for RE:Start GameJam 2022
Idea and creation of the video game by VitaCreator
Art and Sprites by Pixel Frog and Carlos Bv
Music by AdhesiveWombat 
Tested by Rikka, Softer, Carlos Bv, luigi2498, AlexDev and BetterWinds
Sound Effects by Carlos Bv

I hope you like my project <3

technical information
Weight of the game in CSO: 12 MB
Weight of the game in ISO: 125 MB
Weight of the game in ISO (Rar): 10,6 MB
